name: MECHA SNAKE (Defold)
description:
This game is almost like a classic Snake with only a little other mechanics. I made this game for Made with Defold Game Jam.

  • Setting: mechanical keyboard
  • Graphic assets: mine
  • Made with: Defold Engine

Controls:

  • WSAD or arrows
  • SPACE to pause
  • F to mute

This game is incomplete and has bugs. But the snake runs and you can eat only one apple  :) But you can play this version https://strash.itch.io/mecha-snake-godot. It works and more stable.
